## Context
Describe the action item and why it was assigned.

## Assigned to
- @username or role

## Due Date
YYYY-MM-DD

## Status
- [ ] Todo
- [ ] In Progress
- [ ] Blocked
- [ ] Done

## Related Items
Link related proposals, decisions, or PRs

## Notes
Any additional context or check-ins
